content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 641.8 - Mortgagee defined

State Regulations

Mortgagee means a person to whom property is
mortgaged. Notes

641.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
